body_content: Join us as the children have a final summer extravaganza to celebrate the start of school.  There will be games, popcorn, cotton candy, and much more.
description: An exciting time of games for children within the church.

body_content: Just before the teens go back to school, we will have a final summer activity.  Come prepared to get very messy as we will have fun games that are guaranteed to be a blast, followed by an evangelistic message.
description: The Messiest Night of the Year.

body_content: Join us as we plan out the next three months of activities at the church.  Following the meeting, we will enjoy crafting our own ice cream sundaes.  Bring some ideas, and a sweet tooth.
description: We will be having a quarterly planning meeting followed by an ice cream social.

body_content: The Precious Metals will be meeting at a local restaurant for lunch and fellowship.  This is for all those 55 years of age and older.
Join us as we fellowship with softball, basketball, and food.  We will be meeting at the Connie Lance Memorial Park in Cranesville immediately following the morning service.
description: The church family will be having a picnic in at the Cranesville park.
